main event: A bright light was observed moving from North to South in the NW Pacific region, changing color to red before disappearing into the sun's glare.
interesting points: The light appeared larger than a planet., The light moved slowly and was in constant sight., The sighting was made from an aircraft flying at 17,222 feet., There was an unconfirmed report of a Northwest Airlines aircraft also witnessing the light., The exact length of the sighting was unknown.
